summary: A much-needed boost, in the form of a new factory, is promised to the residents of the tiny fishing village St. Marie-La-Mauderne, provided they can lure a doctor to take up full-time residency on the island. Inspired, the villagers devise a scheme to make Dr. Christopher Lewis a local.
cast: Raymond Bouchard|Dominik Michon-Dagenais|Guy-Daniel Tremblay|Nadia Drouin|Rita Lafontaine|Roc LaFortune|Réal Bossé|Guy Vaillancourt|Lucie Laurier|Pierre Collin|Ken Scott|Jean-Pierre Gonthier|Benoît Brière|Marc Legault|Caroline Girard|Betty Jones|Denis Houle|Claude Gasse|Bruno Blanchet|Nadia Rowsell|Alexandrine Agostini|Gilles Pelletier|Frédéric Desager|David Boutin|Philippe Daneault|Marie-France Lambert|Louis-Philippe Dury|Raphaël Grenier-Benoit|Clémence DesRochers|Daniel Rousse|Caroline Néron|Louis Wiriot|Serge Christiaenssens|Donald Pilon|Louis Philippe Dandenault|Manon Gauthier|Véronique Pinette|Gisèle Trépanier|Nathalie Gascon|Luc-Martial Dagenais|Alex Bisping|Caroline Bouchard
title: La gran seducción
